title: Can someone help me out?
body: I went to go verify my email and discovered a different email than one I own is being used. I cannot change it since I don't know the password and cant change the password since I dont know the password to that email. Can someone please help me?

replies.body: It looks like your account has some weird activity going on, so I'd suggest you hit up our account agents through the [**account recovery form**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416). They'll be able to help get your account secured there!
I have already sent one 5 hours ago

I do see your ticket in the queues, so don't worry just yet. It can take a bit to get through everything in ours every once and awhile, and as you can imagine weekends can sometimes be a bit slower. 

I also noticed that you've sent multiple tickets in a short amount of time. Sending more tickets will only put those in the back of line, not bump your ticket ahead in line. Sit tight, and those agents will be answering as soon as they can.
